data.text: Dimaadua la di king, malaa nia daangada ga bolebole mmaadagu.
Dimaadua i Zion le e mogobuna huoloo.
Nia daangada huogodoo ga hagaamu di aamua mo di madamada
Meenei di King Aamua, Goe e aloho i nia mee ala e donu.
Hagaamu ina Dimaadua, go tadau God,
Moses mo Aaron ala go ana daangada hai mee dabu aamua,
Mee ne helekai gi digaula mai i di waduu gololangi.
Meenei Dimaadua, go di madau God, Goe gu helekai gi au daangada.
Hagaamu ina Dimaadua, go tadau God,
